scripts.pixelmatch:reference: cd.. && cd kraken-e2e-base && npx kraken-node run || echo 'El script falló pero seguimos adelante.'
scripts.pixelmatch:test: cd.. && cd kraken-e2e-rc && npx kraken-node run || echo 'El script falló pero seguimos adelante.'
scripts.pixelmatch:compare: cd.. && cd pixelmatch && node compare.mjs || echo 'El script falló pero seguimos adelante.'
scripts.clean:bitmaps: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Path .\bitmaps_reference -Recurse -Force; Remove-Item -Path .\bitmaps_test -Recurse -Force; Remove-Item -Path .\reports -Recurse -Force; New-Item -Path .\bitmaps_reference -ItemType Directory; New-Item -Path .\bitmaps_test -ItemType Directory; New-Item -Path .\reports -ItemType Directory"
scripts.test:all: npm run clean:bitmaps && npm run pixelmatch:reference && npm run pixelmatch:test && npm run pixelmatch:compare
scripts.pixelmatch:installNPM: npm run pixelmatch:installroot && npm run pixelmatch:installbase && npm run pixelmatch:installrc
